info.name: Tagia less bright - updated for 04-12-2018
info.description:
Improved the taiga less bright style to match the changes observed on 04-12-2018
More thorough testing should be performed to ascertain that all elements are treated properly
info.additionalInfo:
Most "bright" elements have been dealt with and any missed elements.
Changed scrollbars to make them a part of the website instead of looking like they don't match at all.
